text:
Do the incoming calls
on your Android phone
go straight to voicemail?
This could happen for several reasons.

In this video, we'll give
you five possible methods
of troubleshooting this issue.
These steps may vary slightly,
depending upon your Android model.
We will be using an LG 40 ThinQ phone.
First, check to make sure

that your phone is not
set to do not disturb,

which sends all of the
calls directly to voicemail.
Pull down your phone's control center

by swiping down from
the top of the screen.

Then make sure that
the do-not-disturb icon
is not enabled.
Your phone's call-blocking feature
may be accidentally blocking phone numbers
that you want to receive.
You can turn this off in your phone app.
Start the phone app.

Tap the three dots at
the top of the screen.

In the drop-down menu, choose
"Settings" or "Call settings."

Then select "Call blocking
& Decline with message,"
and then "Blocked numbers."
Remove any phone numbers from the list

that you don't want to
immediately send to voicemail
by clicking on the small trash-can icon
at the top of the screen,

then selecting "Remove" at
the bottom of the screen.
Some Android phones allow you
to automatically forward your calls
to another number or to voicemail.
Start the phone app.

Tap the three dots at
the top of the screen.
In the drop-down menu,
choose "Settings" or "Call settings."
Choose "Calls" or "Additional settings,"
tap "Other settings,"
then tap "Call forwarding,"

and finally turn off any
of the four listed options:
"Always forward," "Busy,"
"Unanswered," and "Unreachable."
If you recently changed your SIM card,
remove the card and reinsert it
to make sure it's set correctly.

A damaged SIM card
could also be the issue.
In that case, the best option is
to contact your cellular provider
and request a replacement SIM card.
If none of these suggestions work,

there may be a problem
with your cellular service
and not your phone.
Check a coverage map from your provider

to see if you have reliable
service in that area
or test your service with another phone.
If your coverage is very weak,

incoming calls can go
straight to voicemail.
